part_descriptions.right_leg: Bent at the knee, pushing off the ground
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bent at the knee, preparing to swing forward
part_descriptions.torso: Leaning slightly forward, moving quickly

caption: A human runs in a curve.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swinging forward in a running motion
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swinging forward in a running motion
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bent at the knee, swinging backward
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bent at the knee, swinging forward
part_descriptions.torso: Leaning slightly inward while running

caption: A person runs forward.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swinging forward for balance
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swinging forward for momentum
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bent at the knee, pushing off the ground
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bent at the knee, preparing to swing forward
part_descriptions.torso: Leaning slightly forward, moving quickly

caption: A human runs in a 90° rightwards curve.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swinging forward and outward
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swinging backward and inward
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bent at knee, swinging horizontally forward
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bent at knee, swinging horizontally backward
part_descriptions.torso: Leaning slightly inward, twisting at waist

caption: A person doing a forward role out of a jump.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Extending forward and up
part_descriptions.left_arm: Bent at the elbow, swinging backward
part_descriptions.right_leg: Flexed at the knee, pushing off the ground
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bent at the knee, lifting up
part_descriptions.torso: Bent at the waist, moving forward

caption: A human performs a forward roll.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Bent and close to the body, pushing off the ground
part_descriptions.left_arm: Bent and close to the body, pushing off the ground
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bent and in the air, ready to land
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bent and in the air, ready to land
part_descriptions.torso: Curled up in a ball, rolling forward

caption: A person jumps over an obstacle while running.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swinging forward for balance
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swinging backward for momentum
part_descriptions.right_leg: Lifting and extending to clear the obstacle
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bending and swinging forward to propel body
part_descriptions.torso: Bending at waist and twisting to clear obstacle

caption: A person jumps approximately 30 centimeters in the air while running.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swings forward in the air during jump
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swings forward in the air during jump
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bends at the knee and pushes off the ground during run
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bends at the knee and swings forward during run, then pushes off the ground during jump
part_descriptions.torso: Lifts off the ground during jump

caption: a person runs and jumps

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swinging forward for balance and momentum
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swinging backward for balance and propelling the body forward
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bent at the knee and pushing off the ground
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bent at the knee and preparing to push off the ground
part_descriptions.torso: Leaning slightly forward and twisting at the waist for balance

caption: A human runs and jumps over an obstacle and continues her run.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swings forward for balance during run and up for clearance while jumping
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swings backward for balance during run and forward for clearance while jumping
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bends at knee and hip, pushes off the ground during jump
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bends at knee and hip, swings forward for next step during run
part_descriptions.torso: Leans slightly forward during run, bends at waist during jump for better clearance

caption: While running, a human picks something up from the floor.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swings forward to bend at the elbow and pick up the object
part_descriptions.left_arm: Remains swinging at the side for balance
part_descriptions.right_leg: Moves forward to maintain momentum
part_descriptions.left_leg: Swings backward for balance
part_descriptions.torso: Leans slightly forward to reach the floor and maintain balance

caption: A man keep down and lateralyl move

part_descriptions.right_arm: Lies still on the ground
part_descriptions.left_arm: Lies still on the ground
part_descriptions.right_leg: Moves laterally on the ground
part_descriptions.left_leg: Lies still on the ground
part_descriptions.torso: Lies still on the ground

caption: A man bend and keep down ,move laterally

part_descriptions.right_arm: Bent at the elbow and close to the body
part_descriptions.left_arm: Hangs relaxed at the side of the body
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bent at the knee and moves to the right
part_descriptions.left_leg: Straight and slightly supports body weight
part_descriptions.torso: Bent forward at the waist and stable

caption: a person running and stepipng over one step

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swinging forward for balance
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swinging backward for momentum
part_descriptions.right_leg: Lifting for the next step
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bending to touch the ground
part_descriptions.torso: Leaning slightly forward

caption: A person runs straight forward.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swinging forward for balance
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swinging forward for balance
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bent at knee, pushing off the ground
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bent at knee, swinging forward
part_descriptions.torso: Leaning slightly forward, moving straight ahead

caption: A person runs forward, briefly touches the ground with both hands and then continues running.

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swings forward and then returns to running position
part_descriptions.left_arm: Swings forward and then returns to running position
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bends at knee and touches ground, then pushes off to run
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bends at knee and touches ground, then pushes off to run
part_descriptions.torso: Leans slightly forward during running motion

caption: a person stumbles on the ground but gets up and keeps on running

part_descriptions.right_arm: Swings in the air to regain balance
part_descriptions.left_arm: Pushes against the ground for support
part_descriptions.right_leg: Bends and then straightens to lift the body
part_descriptions.left_leg: Bends and then straightens to push off the ground
part_descriptions.torso: Lurches forward and then straightens to continue running
